meta.title: Home - Barre City Elementary & Middle School

meta.name: description
meta.content: Home - Barre City Elementary & Middle School
Home - Barre City Elementary & Middle School
Home - Barre City Elementary & Middle School

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme3

img.alt: Barre City Cheerleaders March on Main Street
picture of friends playing on the swing set

div.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsList fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailLarge fsItemCount_15

div.p: Yearbook needs your Help! Please take pictures of yourself working, playing, or whatever else you might think would be fun to share. Also info on how to purchase a yearbook. Open to see more info.

The Barre Unified Union School District will be offering free meals to anyone ages 18 and under starting March 18. These meals will be offered weekly Monday, Wednesday, and Friday until further notice.
We will have one open meal site and multiple sites we are delivering to. Click the image above to learn more.

The State of Vermont passed a new law in 2019 that requires all schools and child care providers to test their drinking water for lead. Barre City Elementary and Middle School participated in pilot testing in Spring 2018. Based on those results, we received a waiver on new testing and remediated based on results from 2018.

div.a: Bulldog Bulletin: Edition I (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Check out this year's first edition of our middle school newspaper, the Bulldog Bulletin, led by Ms. Neddo!

A huge thank you to everyone that participated and gave feedback in our first budget survey. We appreciate all of the comments and responses and will use this information as we develop our budget for next year. We continue to work to improve how we communicate and engage with our community, so please let us know if you have any questions or need more information. We look forward to hearing from you again soon!

img.alt: "I decided that if I could paint that flower in a huge scale, you could not ignore its beauty."
